text:
- Stuff returned by  `plot_stat_map` is no documented (it seems a Slicer object is returned by default)
- if output_file is passed, then a None object is returned instead

It would be nice to have the return type documented, and also we should always return the same object type (e.g a Slicer).
title: Inconsistent and undocument return types for plot_stat_map (and probably other such API)

text: I would like to agree that a) consistency across plotting API and b) mentionning the output variable type in the docstring appears reasonable.
